sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>1</base_damage> <critical_rating>2</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>A vibroknife is essentially a modded combat knife, but since they have proven so effective, they have become manufactured as such throughout the galaxy. The basic premise is simpleâ€”a small but powerful device within the knife's handle vibrates the blade at an incredibly high frequency so that it essentially acts as a miniature saw. Vibroknives aren't as powerful as lightsabers against most substances, but one need not be a Jedi to wield it effectively.  Models Include: Merr-Sonn Treppus-2 Vibroblade.</description> <encumbrance>1</encumbrance> <hard_points>2</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Vibroknife</name> <number>GEAR0001033</number> <price>250</price> <range>engaged</range> <rarity>3</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Melee (Br)">0c90dd5cdbae88542901de90cf9619a4</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 16:18:54</sys_created_on> <sys_id>fc283ee82f50a450e0f497eef699b653</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 16:18:54</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
